metadata.description: Production-tested skills for Claude Code - Cloudflare, Firebase, AI, React, Tailwind v4, and modern web development

plugins.name: project
plugins.description: Project lifecycle skills - planning, session management, documentation, and workflow automation. 13 commands for /project:plan-feature, /project:docs-init, etc.

plugins.name: cloudflare
plugins.description: Cloudflare platform skills - Workers, D1, R2, KV, AI, Queues, Durable Objects, MCP servers, and more. 17 production-tested skills for edge computing.

plugins.name: ai
plugins.description: AI and LLM integration skills - Vercel AI SDK, OpenAI, Google Gemini, Claude API, ElevenLabs. 14 skills for building AI applications.

plugins.name: frontend
plugins.description: Frontend and UI skills - Tailwind v4, shadcn/ui, TanStack suite, jQuery 4, animations, and React Native. 14 skills for modern web and mobile UIs.

plugins.name: design
plugins.description: Web design and accessibility skills - color palettes, SEO metadata, responsive images, WCAG 2.1 AA compliance, favicon generation, Gemini image generation, icon selection, and reusable Tailwind patterns. 8 skills for modern, accessible websites.

plugins.name: auth
plugins.description: Authentication skills - Clerk and Better Auth integrations for user management and security.

plugins.name: database
plugins.description: Database and storage skills - Drizzle ORM, Neon Postgres, Vercel KV, and Vercel Blob.

plugins.name: firebase
plugins.description: Firebase platform skills - Firestore NoSQL database, Authentication, and Cloud Storage. 3 production-tested skills for building Firebase applications.

plugins.name: cms
plugins.description: Content management skills - TinaCMS, Sveltia CMS, and WordPress plugin development.

plugins.name: backend
plugins.description: Backend framework skills - FastAPI and Flask for Python web services.

plugins.name: mcp
plugins.description: MCP server development skills - TypeScript MCP, FastMCP (Python), and agent SDK for building Model Context Protocol servers.

plugins.name: office
plugins.description: Office document generation - create DOCX, XLSX, and PDF documents with TypeScript. Works in Claude Code CLI, Cloudflare Workers, and browsers.

plugins.name: contrib
plugins.description: Contribution and skill development tools - creating skills, reviewing skills, and open-source contribution patterns.
